snippet: Henrique tied the game with 40 seconds left in regulation and then scored a power-play goal less than two minutes into overtime to lead the Devils to victory in Nashville.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New Jersey Devils defeat Nashville Predators, 5-4.
lead_paragraph: Henrique tied the game with 40 seconds left in regulation and then scored a power-play goal less than two minutes into overtime to lead the Devils to victory in Nashville.

headline.print_headline: Devils Top Predators in Overtime on Adam Henrique’s Second Goal
headline.main: Devils Top Predators in Overtime on Adam Henrique’s Second Goal
